title: WaveX Invites Applications for India AI Impact Summit 2026

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content: WaveX invites startups to participate in India AI Impact Summit 2026, to be held from February 16-20, 2026, in New Delhi. The summit will focus on AI solutions in media, entertainment, and emerging technologies. WaveX will provide a platform for business networking and exhibition for AI startups.

sections.heading: Details
sections.content: The India AI Impact Summit 2026 will bring together innovators, policymakers, industry leaders, investors, and global stakeholders to promote collaboration in the creative and technology ecosystems. The summit will feature a startup exhibition program, showcasing AI-based products and solutions. Attendees will include startups, government institutions, and industry experts.

sections.heading: Key Information
points: WaveX invites startups to participate in India AI Impact Summit 2026.
The summit will focus on AI solutions in media, entertainment, and emerging technologies.
WaveX will provide a platform for AI startups to showcase their products and network with industry leaders.
The summit aims to boost collaboration in India's AI innovation ecosystem and promote innovative AI solutions.
